item_starter_dagger.name: rusty dagger
item_starter_dagger.description: A simple dagger with a rusty blade, but it's better than nothing.

item_iron_sword.name: iron sword
item_iron_sword.description: A well-crafted iron sword with a leather-wrapped hilt. The blade is sharp and balanced.

item_pitchfork.name: pitchfork
item_pitchfork.description: A sturdy pitchfork used for moving hay.

item_rusty_sword.name: rusty sword
item_rusty_sword.description: An old sword, covered in rust.

item_dagger.name: dagger
item_dagger.description: A standard dagger, suitable for close combat.

item_crude_club.name: crude club
item_crude_club.description: A heavy, crudely fashioned wooden club.

item_spider_fang.name: spider fang dagger
item_spider_fang.description: A dagger crafted from the venomous fang of a giant spider. It drips slightly.

item_simple_bow.name: simple bow
item_simple_bow.description: A simple but effective wooden bow.

item_cursed_dagger.name: cursed dagger
item_cursed_dagger.description: A wicked-looking dagger with unsettling runes carved into the blade.

item_barbed_spear.name: barbed spear
item_barbed_spear.description: A long spear with a cruel, barbed tip.

item_hobgoblin_sword.name: hobgoblin sword
item_hobgoblin_sword.description: A well-made, practical shortsword of hobgoblin make.

item_shamanic_staff.name: shamanic staff
item_shamanic_staff.description: A gnarled wooden staff adorned with feathers and skulls.
